morpheus_briefing_task.description: As Morpheus, receive a mission on the topic of "AI Tools in Higher Education". Your task is to analyze the request, determine the most appropriate agents and task flow, and generate a composable micro-crew that includes at least a researcher and analyst. Assign roles with clear rationale, ensuring that tasks are interdependent when appropriate.
morpheus_briefing_task.expected_output: A JSON or Markdown plan listing the selected agents, assigned tasks, and justification for each role. The plan should describe the order of operations and dependencies between tasks.

research_task.description: Conduct foundational research on AI Tools in Higher Education including: 1. Core definitions and background 2. Current relevance (as of 2025) 3. Recent developments or applications 4. Key stakeholders or debates
research_task.expected_output: A structured document with 5-7 bullet-pointed insights on AI Tools in Higher Education, citing credible sources.

reporting_task.description: Using the output from the research_task, develop an expanded, structured report covering: 1. Executive summary 2. Thematic sections with explanatory detail 3. Implications and recommendations
reporting_task.expected_output: A professional markdown report with headings, citations, and a conclusion that builds on the research.

morpheus_wrapup_task.description: Review all outputs generated by the researcher and reporting_analyst. Your job is to synthesize the work into: 1. A poetic, metaphor-rich summary suitable for a public audience 2. A call to action or civic reflection 3. Credit to the agents involved and a brief outline of their contributions
morpheus_wrapup_task.expected_output: A dreamlike wrap-up message, designed for public communication—e.g., a blog post, social media thread, or final reflection. Use narrative clarity, metaphor, and attribution.
